name: Eldritch Knight
description: Eldritch Knights use magic to supplement their martial talents.

3.name: Spellcasting
3.description: Augment your combat with wizard spells, focusing on abjuration and evocation.

3.name: Weapon Bond
3.description: Perform a ritual to bond with a weapon, preventing disarmament and allowing you to summon it.

7.name: War Magic
7.description: After casting a cantrip, make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

10.name: Eldritch Strike
10.description: When you hit a creature, it has disadvantage on the next saving throw against a spell you cast.

15.name: Arcane Charge
15.description: When you use Action Surge, teleport up to 30 feet before or after the additional action.

18.name: Improved War Magic
18.description: After casting a spell, make one weapon attack as a bonus action.
